about.details:
Incorporated in 2018, Magson Retail & Distribution Limited is engaged in the retail and distribution business of gourmet, frozen food, and specialty foods.

Magson Retail & Distribution's product category includes:

  • Frozen food Vegetarian and Non-vegetarian
  • Premium Cheese and Dairy products
  • Exotic Vegetables and fruits
  • Ambient Products
  • Imported/ luxury Chocolates
  • Imported packed products

The company has over 26 retail stores/outlets of which 16 are operated by the company, 7 are operated by franchise owners and 3 stores are operated under 2 joint ventures. MRDL operates all its stores under the registered brand name "MagSon".

These stores/outlets are located across Western India with 26 outlets in prominent cities which includes one each in Thane, Udaipur, Gandhinagar, Anand, Rajkot, Jamnagar, and Gandhidham. Three stores each in Surat and Vadodara, and thirteen stores/outlets in Ahmedabad (including one chocolate store). The total retail space of 26 outlets/stores is more than 30,000 sq. ft. with the total stock (SKU) count in the store being more than 3000 units.

The company has rented a warehouse of more than 14,000 sq. ft. in Ahmedabad from where it manages its inventory. Magson procures 75% of the products directly from the manufacturers thereby eliminating the middlemen which enables the company to earn higher margins. The other 25% is supplied directly from other distributors/wholesalers.

In December 2021, Magson launched its own brand - Rf Gourmet, it provides premium products such as French Fries, Fiery Fries, Chilli Garlic Potato Shots, Delhi Aloo Tikki, Veggie Burger Tikki, Chunky Fries, Eggs, and a range of Chicken Seekh Kababs.

faqs.question: What is the Magson IPO?
faqs.answer:
Magson IPO is a SME IPO of 2114000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹13.74 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹65 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on June 23, 2023, and closes on June 27, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Magson IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Magson IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Magson IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Magson IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Magson IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Magson IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Magson IPO opens on June 23, 2023 and closes on June 27, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Magson IPO?
faqs.answer: Magson IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,30,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Magson IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Magson IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Magson IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Magson IPO will be done on Monday, July 3, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, July 5, 2023. Check the Magson IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Magson IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Magson IPO listing date is on Thursday, July 6, 2023.
